isTravelerBreachingDaysLimitOfStaying(ad.notice: - Check whether or not a given traveler is breaching the 90 days limit of staying in Schengen Area.- NOTE: Travelers can stay in the Schengen Area (which includes most EU countries) for up to 90 days within a 180-day period without a visa for tourism, business, or family visits.
